title: On the move
creator_credit: Graham Chase, Alex Ezard, Suzanne Baker and Film Australia
brief_description: Sister Audrey Tomlinson and a team of several other nurses and aides describe their work and conditions. They travel around Queensland caring for Aborigines, and teach them basic preventive medicine.
creator_credit_for_label: Graham Chase, Alex Ezard, Suzanne Baker and Film Australia
